entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Extract base class doesn't remove `sealed` modifier #63929
  • PdbWriter.SerializeDebugInfo() drops extern namespaces if the first method is a synthesized method #63927
    17.4
  • CS0657 diagnostic suppressor is not reflected in IDE/errors (but it is in build output) #63923
  • IntelliSense is hard-selecting item not matching the case I'm writing #63922
  • After upgrading Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Workspace from 4.2.0 to 4.3.0 it started throwing at runtime #63921
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp 4.3.0 fail to build source generators #63919

Closed

  • Generate Method generates doubly nullable struct types when used with null coalescing operator #63883
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32911.17 #63925
  • New Rename UI it too bright in dark theme :) #63643
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix issue caused by merges of two PRs that conflicted with each other. #63931
    Area-IDE
  • Use attributes consistently in tests. #63930
    Area-IDE
  • Do not serialize extern namespaces to synthesized method #63928
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Do not go back from Solution snapshot to Workspace in Metadata-as-Source #63869
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move todo-comments onto LSP. #63784
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix type inference in coalesce expression #63884
    Area-IDE, Next
  • When shrinking breakpoints down to less lines, stick to the end of the range #63731
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63926
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Use common pattern for traits in tests #63893
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63924
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add binding for textbox colors #63914
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Change test import ordering based on runtime globalization library #63853
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63880
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #63918
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63932
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Clean up implementation of SymbolInfo #63698
    Area-Compilers
  • Move diagnostic tagging to 'pull diagnostics' #63858
    Area-IDE
  • Improve readability of EnC log in memory dumps #63908
    Area-Interactive
  • Emit [module: RefSafetyRules] attribute for all modules compiled with updated escape rules #63916
    Area-Compilers
  • Add feature flag #63910
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1987893 #63879
